issues.description: The template defines ArrayHelpers.appendElement(...) but Stock.addToStockIngredients calls ArrayHelpers.addElementToArray(...), which does not exist. This breaks compilation and prevents students from appending elements to arrays as intended.
issues.suggested_fix: Rename ArrayHelpers.appendElement to addElementToArray, or update Stock.addToStockIngredients to call appendElement instead of addElementToArray, so that method names match.

issues.description: The helper method for adding an element to an array is named appendElement in the template repository but renamed to addElementToArray in the solution repository, causing students to face inconsistent method names when following from template to reference implementation.
issues.suggested_fix: Use a single consistent method name across both template and solution. For example, rename the template method appendElement to addElementToArray (and update its call sites) so it matches the solution implementation.
